friend.follow.error: Imeshindikana kuongeza rafiki. Tafadhali jaribu tena baadaye.
friend.unfollow.error: Imeshindikana kuacha kufuata. Tafadhali jaribu tena baadaye.
story.add.title: Hadithi mpya
story.add.error.upload: Imeshindikana kupakia. Tafadhali jaribu tena baadaye.
story.add.cancel.message: Una hadithi ambayo haijakamilika. Unataka kuacha kuandika?
story.add.noPermission.message: Hakuna ruhusa ya picha. Tafadhali ruhusu upatikanaji kwenye mipangilio.
story.block.confirm.title: Zuia
story.block.confirm.message:
Je, una uhakika unataka kuzuia?
Hautaona tena hadithi za mtumiaji aliyezuiliwa.
story.hide.confirm.message: Je, hutaki kuona hadithi hii tena?
story.report.confirm.title: Ripoti
story.report.confirm.message: Je, una uhakika unataka kuripoti hadithi hii?
story.report.reason.3: Maudhui ya matusi au ya kingono
story.report.confirm: Je, una uhakika unataka kukamilisha ripoti? Ukisha ripoti, hadithi hii haitakuwa tena kwenye mwonekano. Sababu ya ripoti yako itatumwa kwa timu ya usaidizi, na hatua zinazofaa zinaweza kuchukuliwa dhidi ya mwandishi.
settings.title: Mipangilio
settings.autoPlay.confirm: Kicheza hadithi kitatumia kucheza kiotomatiki. Unataka kuendelea?
settings.autoPlay.enableStopPassword: Tumia neno la siri la kusimamisha
settings.leave.confirm: Unataka kufuta akaunti yako? Data zote zitafutwa na haziwezi kurejeshwa. Kujiandikisha tena haitowezekana kwa siku 90.
settings.leave.failed: Imeshindikana kufuta akaunti. Tafadhali jaribu tena baadaye.
signin.title: Anbu
signin.email.address.error: Tafadhali ingiza anwani sahihi ya barua pepe
signin.email.password.error: Tafadhali ingiza neno sahihi la siri
signin.email.signin.failure: Imeshindikana kuingia. Thibitisha barua pepe yako na neno la siri.
signup.title: Jisajili
signup.username.error: Inaruhusiwa herufi na nambari tu, kati ya herufi 4 hadi 16.
signup.nickname.error: Inaruhusiwa herufi 2 hadi 16 tu, bila nafasi.
signup.terms_and_condition.message: Tafadhali ukubali masharti hapa chini ili kujiandikisha.
signup.agree_to_mandatory: Lazima ukubali masharti yote ya lazima ili kujiandikisha.
signup.failed: Imeshindikana kujiandikisha. Tafadhali jaribu tena baadaye.
signup.error.need_to_confirm_username: Tafadhali angalia upatikanaji wa jina la mtumiaji.
signup.error.username_exists: Jina la mtumiaji hili tayari linatumika.
signup.email.password.confirm.hint: Ingiza neno lako la siri tena
signup.email.password.error: Ingiza neno la siri lenye herufi 8 au zaidi, likijumuisha herufi kubwa na ndogo, nambari, na alama maalum.
signup.email.verify.title: Inasubiri uthibitisho wa barua pepe
signup.email.verify.description: Tafadhali angalia barua pepe yako ili kumaliza uthibitisho.
player.password.title: Ingiza neno la siri
player.password.incomplete: Tafadhali ingiza neno la siri kamili.
